metadata.title: CVE-2020-13170 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise did not appropriately enforce scopefor local tokens issued by a primary data center, where replication to asecondary data center was not enabled. Introduced in 1.4.0, fixed in 1.6.6and 1.7.4.

criterions.comment: consul package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
